products.productName: White Pre-Cut Foam Board Multi-Packs, 11 x 14, 4/Pack
products.fullDescription: Pre-cut sheets are uniform and even in size! Lightweight but strong and rigid to resist denting and crushing. Resilient polystyrene core bounces back after cutting to keep the board uniform edge to edge. The smooth surface satisfies a wide range of media including markers and paint. Perfect for crafts, school projects, framing and mounting.

products.productName: Premium Foam Display Board, CFC-Free Polystyrene, 24 x 36, White Surface and Core, 12/Carton
products.fullDescription: A convenient foundation for any presentation. Create self-standing displays for school projects or business presentations with Tri-Fold Display Boards. These sturdy foam boards help you add a professional touch to your work. Each board folds for easy storage and features a smooth white surface that’s perfect for markers, paints and adhesives.

products.productName: Titanium Bonded Scissors, 8" Long, 3.5" Cut Length, Straight Gray/Yellow Handle
products.fullDescription: These high-performance, titanium bonded blades are three times stronger than stainless steel. The cutting edge stays sharper longer.

products.productName: Hot Forged Carbon Steel Shears, 8" Long, 3.88" Cut Length, Straight Nickel Handle
products.fullDescription: These scissors are made of cutlery quality of hot drop forged from carbon steel. Hardened, tempered and precision ground for lasting sharpness. They are exceptionally strong and have a lustrous finish.

products.productName: Hot Forged Carbon Steel Shears, 9" Long, 4.5" Cut Length, Straight Black Handle
products.fullDescription: These scissors are made of cutlery quality of hot drop forged from carbon steel. Hardened, tempered and precision ground for lasting sharpness. They are exceptionally strong and have a lustrous finish.

products.productName: Fine Tip Permanent Marker, Fine Bullet Tip, Black, Dozen
products.fullDescription: Bold to the max and permanent to the core, Sharpie® Fine Tip Permanent Markers inspire you to transform ordinary surfaces into passionately creative statements. Made to write practically everywhere, vivid Sharpie® markers eliminate dull and boring. The original permanent marker, Sharpie® has the iconic ink that dries quickly and resists both water and fading. While pale imitations wither away, Sharpie® markers make creations that endure. Featuring a bold, fine point bullet tip built for jaw-dropping marks, these permanent markers ignite courageous self-expression.

products.fullDescription: For the most demanding applications, Exact Index is ideal for everyday projects in the classroom and the office. It features a uniform, smooth surface that is durable enough to take on the toughest jobs, and it holds up to frequent handling and the rigors of postal machines. You can create ample amount of letterheads, report covers, brochures, menus, and more. Just add creativity!

products.productName: Stainless Steel Office Scissors, 8" Long, 3.75" Cut Length, Straight Black Handle
products.fullDescription: Make all of your cutting tasks easier, from common household and office tasks to various pack-and-ship applications. Tough, sharp, stainless-steel cutting blades provide precision cutting and excellent durability. They're sharp enough to cut through a variety of materials with ease, whether it's copy paper or corrugated cardboard. Comfortable handle features a versatile design that allows for either left or right-handed use.

products.productName: Invisible Tape, 1" Core, 0.75" x 83.33 ft, Clear, 6/Pack
products.fullDescription: Be as subtle or as obvious as you wish to be. Matte finish tape disappears on contact, but it also accepts ink and pencil marks. Whether you want your repairs to be invisible or your labeling notes to be noticed, this is the right tape for the job. Enhanced adhesive holds tight to most dry, nonporous surfaces. Resilient backing is ideal for repairing damaged documents and sealing correspondence. Standard-core rolls fit most desktop-tape dispensers.

products.productName: Magic Tape Value Pack, 1" Core, 0.75" x 83.33 ft, Clear, 10/Pack
products.fullDescription: Scotch® Magic Tape works as hard as you do to fix all the little imperfections at home, school and the office. The Scotch® Brand's famous matte-finish invisible tape uses unique 3M adhesive technology to bond tightly with paper and disappear without a trace. Write on it with pencil, pen or marker-every word is loud and clear. Scotch® Magic Tape: Always ready for big ideas and everyday mends.

products.productName: Ultra-Clean Washable Markers, Broad Bullet Tip, Assorted Colors, 8/Pack
products.fullDescription: Keep color where it belongs with Crayola Ultra-Clean Washable Markers, the perfect choice for worry-free creativity. Featuring vibrant Color Max Ink technology, these markers deliver bold, long-lasting color without bleeding through the page, ensuring clean and beautiful results every time. Designed with parents and teachers in mind, the ultra-washable formula easily rinses off skin, walls, and most washable clothing, making cleanup a breeze. Ideal for classrooms, art projects, and home use, these markers provide bright, vivid colors that inspire creativity while keeping messes under control. Let kids explore their artistic side confidently with these reliable, easy-to-clean markers.

products.productName: Point Guard Flair Felt Tip Porous Point Pen, Stick, Medium 0.7 mm, Black Ink, Black Barrel, Dozen
products.fullDescription: Add bright, vivid details to your writing and drawing with Paper Mate Flair Felt Tip Pens. Featuring a comfortable barrel grip and high-quality water-based inks, these pens are compatible with most surfaces and won't bleed through paper. These pens feature point guards that prevent the tips from fraying and drying out to keep your pen fresh. Every stroke produces bold, clean lines that are perfect for drawing, editing documents and checking papers.

products.productName: Spray Adhesive, 14 oz, Dries Clear
products.fullDescription: Gorilla Spray Adhesive is heavy duty, multi-purpose and easy to use. While repositionable for up to 10 minutes, Gorilla Spray adhesive forms a clear, permanent bond that is photo safe. Its wide pad nozzle and controlled fine mist provide an even application on the project you are working on.
